events.message: I would like to request a refund for my recent order as the wrong item was sent to me and I am very disappointed.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the incorrect product delivery as reported by the customer.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect item delivery.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 45893217. I have attached a photo showing the wrong item that was shipped to me.
Thank you for the details. We have initiated a full refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected within 5 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response and refund initiation. I appreciate your quick help resolving this issue.
We are glad your refund issue is now resolved. Please feel free to reach out if you have further concerns.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything has been settled to your satisfaction.
We are closing your case now as your refund was successfully processed and the issue has been resolved.
